text: Bought a toilet set from this shop. Lady boss selected one based on my photo & dimensions. Allowed to exchange for other products if the toilet seat can’t be used.
Very happy with the service. The lady seller was so nice and knowledgeable. She smiled and explained things clearly. 2 thumps up. Will come back again

The after Sales service is very bad. Bought an ICI White n light grey paint. But it turn out that the white is light grey n light grey is darker grey.

The lady boss keep saying White is acceptable even after I provide photo showing clearly that the white turn out to be light grey.

refer to the photo, my original ceiling is white and wall is light grey. Both by ICI paint. You can observed very clearly that the ICI white Soon Hui sold me was clearly a matching grey to the light grey I repainted using Nippon Paint.

I feedback there could be some error in the mixing which result wrong paint fill in the container. But lady boss think she provided correct paint, even though actual result show otherwise.

My advise is never buy fr this dishonour store.
Lady in the store is nice, immediately smiled when I entered the store and answered my question in a friendly manner. Sells all sorts of hardware tools and paint. I came to purchase a safety helmet.
The service to make a key is poor, the lady boss is not aware of their product expire date just said nobody complain then treat it is ok for us. I will not visit this shop again...
